title: The Ripple Effect

dialogue.speaker: New Seeker
dialogue.text: *hesitant at the circle's edge* I heard... I heard you can be uncertain here without being fixed.
dialogue.context: First time attending the Questions Quarter

dialogue.speaker: Maya
dialogue.text: *warm welcome* That's exactly right. Here, not knowing isn't a problem to solveit's a space to explore.

dialogue.speaker: New Seeker
dialogue.text: *tears starting* I've been pretending to have answers for so long. I'm exhausted.

dialogue.speaker: Sage
dialogue.text: *recognizing herself* I remember that exhaustion. It's the weight of carrying certainties that were never ours to hold.
dialogue.context: Seeing her past self in the newcomer

dialogue.speaker: Memorial Tree
dialogue.text: *wind through branches sounds like whispers* Every question plants a seed. Every uncertainty grows new possibilities.

dialogue.speaker: Circle Together
dialogue.text: *voices blending* Welcome to not knowing. Welcome to wondering. Welcome home.

dialogue.speaker: New Seeker
dialogue.text: *sitting down in circle* I don't know who I am... and for the first time, that feels like freedom.

scene_context: The Questions Quarter continues to grow as more seekers find their way to the circle, each bringing their own uncertainties to add to the collective exploration.
visual_elements: Expanding circle, memorial tree as witness, new faces joining ancient questions
